abstract: Diana Wagman reviews middle-grade novel The Girl Who Drank the Moon by Kelly Barnhill.

headline.main: A Novel’s Good Witch Saves a Sacrificial Girl

keywords.value: The Girl Who Drank the Moon (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: A good witch raises an enchanted girl, the sacrifice a town is duped into offering, in Kelly Barnhill’s “The Girl Who Drank the Moon.”...
lead_paragraph: A good witch raises an enchanted girl, the sacrifice a town is duped into offering, in Kelly Barnhill’s “The Girl Who Drank the Moon.”
